ygData.subject: Re: Why did you choose to play a paladin?
ygData.msgSnippet: To start with I have always gotten into the Holy Knight thing since I was a kid. I wanted something more than a warrior or barbarian and I saw the usefulness
ygData.messageBody:
To start with I have always gotten into the Holy Knight thing since I was a
kid. I wanted something more than a warrior or barbarian and I saw the
usefulness of the cleric, being a paladin and having the ability to help
others in a pinch and having the ability to take alot of damage - LOH, and of
course my disgust of the undead, the paladin class naturally appealed to me.
I have just reached lvl 10 and have found that this class only gets better
with age and look forward to hitting 22, then Befallen shall be mine!!!

Altor Loqnarr
